授業方法: As the course will provide actual experience of qualitative research via class and homework, and requires group work. Therefore the course will be conducted Face to Face and must physically attend Lecture 7-10(Sept 30) and lecture 11-12 (Oct 1) Sept 28/29 lectures will be Online. Individual/The class or team homework are required.

トピック.授業計画1:
The course requires Face to Face discussion on the site, except Sept 28/29.
Lecture 1-2
An introduction of the course, the expectation from/towards students,
What is "Insight" and Tools to mine "insight".
Lecture 3-4
Presentation/Discussion about Homework - the experience of qualitative research
How to plan/conduct/listen qualitative research for "Insight mining".
Lecture 5-6
Presentation/Discussion about Homework - the experience of qualitative research
Lecture 7-12
Mock Qualitative exercise (preparation to debriefing )
Lecture 13-14
The learning sharing (the report) by individual
Guest speaker
トピック.授業外学習2:
Individual (total 35 hours expected)
Experience of qualitative research by individual, report development for reviewing lectures, Presentation preparation.
The class or team (total 10 hours expected)
Preparation of Class/Team work

参考書/Reference books1: Qualitative Research Methods: Collecting Evidence, Crafting Analysis, Communicating Impact
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading2: Report/Presentation 40% Individual contribution towards class or the team (peer evaluation) 40%
評価.成績評価Grading3:
備考　Note
The theme of the report will be shared at the 1st lecture.
If you are absent without reasons, 10% will be deducted, as this course puts real experience via individual as well as the class/team important.
